meanings.definition: In a formal or authoritative manner
meanings.sent1: The teacher officially announced the test results to the class.
meanings.sent2: The president officially signed the important document.
meanings.sent3: The cat officially declared the cardboard box as its new kingdom.
meanings.sent4: The sun officially set, painting the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The judge officially banged the gavel, bringing the courtroom to order.

meanings.definition: By or with the authority of an organization or government
meanings.sent1: The company officially launched its new product line.
meanings.sent2: The mayor officially opened the new community center.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel officially claimed the bird feeder as its own territory.
meanings.sent4: The storm officially swept through the town, leaving destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The referee officially blew the whistle, signaling the end of the game.
